name: eth-stamina-game
description: Stamina is a game where every player gets their stake back, as long as they play 1x every 24h. If a player has a gap greater than 24h, all of their stakes are forfeit. 90% of the forfeited stakes are distributed to the winners, in proportion to the amount they staked in total each round.

scripts.testGrep: npx hardhat compile && npx mocha --require ts-node/register/files --extension ts --fgrep $1

author: Tony Haenn
